entry.title: Body+ Trio
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Owl
Type: Body Oil
Price: 78.00

Inspired by three of the earth's most precious gemstones, SkinOwl's trio of body + face illuminators are designed to highlight, soften, and perfect the skin, while adding nourishment with uniquely penetrating and effective pure plant oils.

Amethyst: Gift yourself the look of lilac luminescence. Cancel out the look of tired, lackluster skin with a radiance-boosting opalescence and amethyst-hued holographic sheen.

Morganite: Slip into a radiant rose gold sheen. Skin flickers with the look of peaches + candlelight. Where sun-kissed and soft focus become one.

Selenite Crystal: Drench the skin in sparkle and snow-kisses. Angelic crystalline calms redness and mitigates the appearance of uneven texture and tone.

• Each Bottle is 2 fl oz / 60 ml

• Made WITHOUT: Parabens, Synthetic fragrances, Gluten, Cruelty-free, Ethoxylated ingredients, Fragrance, Sulfates, Phthalates, Propylene Glycol, Mineral Oils, Synthetic Dyes, Paba, Titanium Dioxide, Nano-Particles, Chemical UV Absorbers

Ingredients

Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Organic Jojoba) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis (Organic Aloe) Leaf Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flowers in Olea Europaea (Organic Olive) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Azadirachta Indica (Neem) Seed Oil, Mica

Directions

These unscented and soothing oils can be worn under makeup or by itself. Slide dropper atop shoulders, cheekbones and collarbone for an all-over glow.

entry.title: Maqui Berry Beauty Drops PM
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Owl
Type: Face Serum
Price: 85.00

SkinOwl invites you to experience the world's strongest fruit antioxidant in a never-before-seen face oil! Intended for all skin types, the Maqui Berry Drops contain antioxidants + phytochemicals that neutralize DNA-damaging free radicals and reduce cell damage. Dull skin turns radiant, congested skin appears clear and diffused, uneven texture and tone visibly diminish.

• Contains only natural + certified organic ingredients

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Cruelty free

Ingredients

Raw, Organic, cold-pressed African Adansonia digitata (Baobab) Oil, Pure Aristotelia chilensis (Maqui Berry) Oil, Vanilla planifolia (vanilla) Co2 extract, Citrus reticulata (tangerine) oil

Directions

After cleansing the skin, use 5-7 drops in place of your serum or moisturizer. Massage onto skin and let penetrate.

entry.title: Beauty Whip
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Owl
Type: Facial Mask
Price: 68.00

Discover the beauty benefits behind this all-in-one face mask, makeup primer, and Beauty Drops booster. One application reveals the look of intense moisture, even texture + tone, and a visibly brighter complexion.

This gentle, creamy skin-drenching mask is boosted with fierce hydrators like Hyaluronic Acid, Organic Olive and Jojoba Oils, plus antioxidant rich Patagonian Maqui Berry, Organic Rooibos, toning DMAE, and smoothing MSM. Intended for all skin types.

• All Natural + Organic Ingredients

• Vegan, Gluten free, Cruelty free

• 2 oz / 57 g

Founder's Tip: I love mixing one pump's worth with my Geranium Beauty Drops. It acts as a moisture booster and a makeup primer. I keep it in the fridge for extra plumping.

Ingredients

Organic Aloe Leaf Juice (Aloe Barbadensis), Organic Olive Fruit Oil (Olea Europaea), Organic Alcohol, Organic Jojoba Seed Oil (Simmondsia Chinensis), Emulsifying Wax (Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Lecithin), Stearic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, MSM (Dimethyl Sulfone), DMAE Bitartrate (Dimethylaminoethanol Bitartrate), Rosehip Seed Oil (Rosa Canina), Organic Evening Primrose Oil (Oenothera Biennis), Organic Rooibos Leaf Extract (Aspalathus Linearis), Organic Lavender Extract (Lavandula Angustifolia), Maqui Berry (Aristotelia chilensis) Concentrate Powder, Organic Calendula Flower Extract (Calendula Officinalis), Organic Green Tea Leaf Extract (Camellia Sinensis), Organic White Tea Leaf Extract (Camellia Sinensis), Vitamin E (Tocopherol), Sunflower Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus), Xanthan Gum

Directions

Apply a thin layer to cleansed skin, avoiding eye area. Leave on for up to thirty minutes. Can be used as an overnight mask and rinsed off in the morning. Follow with the Beauty Drops of your choice. Best when refrigerated.

entry.title: Neck+
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Owl
Type: neck treatment
Price: 68.00

A symphony of healing herbs, restorative plant and flower compounds, and Ocean Mineral Complex in a super concentrated, bio-available delivery system. This super-smoothing & contouring neck concentrate is made with age-defying ingredients to create a smooth, youthful, and contoured neck and décolleté. Skin looks smooth, supple, and quenched, with dark spots & crease marks visibly reduced. Tight, toned, and radiant skin will be the evidence of this product's efficacy.

• 4 fl oz / 118 ml

Ingredients

Organic Herbal Infusion, Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel), Methylsulfonylmethane (MSM), Hydroxyethyl Cellulose, Carrageenan Gum, Ocean Mineral Complex, Organic Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba Oil), Spriulina Maxima (Spirulina), Chondrus Crispus (Irish Moss), Organic Curcuma Longa (Turmeric), Wildcrafted Achillea Millefolium (Yarrow), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Ethyl Hexyl Glycerin.

Directions

Apply a small amount to entire face, neck and décolleté after showering. Allow to dry. Follow with SkinOwl's Body Oil. Suitable for all skin types. For external use only. Can be used daily.

entry.title: Organic Eye+
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Owl
Type: Eye Serum
Price: 46.00

Eye+ is a lightweight and effective eye area treatment. Hyaluronic acid, periwinkle, and licorice ensure that through deep absorption crepe-paper skin is transformed into healthy, firm skin. Boasting aloe vera and cucumber, Eye+ is the ultimate concentrate to combat fatigued, tired, puffy skin.

• 0.8 oz

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract (Organic Aloe), Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil (Organic Jojoba), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Dimethyl Sulfone (MSM), Cucumis Sativis Water (hydrosol), Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide (botanical hyaluronic acid), Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Proline, Threonine, Isoleucine, Phenylalanine, Histidine, Vinca Major Extract (Organic Periwinkle), Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract (Organic Licorice), Centella Asiatica Extract (Organic Gotu Kola), Equisetum Arvense Extract (Horsetail), Taraxacum Officinale Extract (Dandelion), Geranium Maculatum Extract (Wild Geranium), Hydoxyethyl Ethylcellulose, Carrageenan Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Ethylhexylglycerin

Directions

Dab around eyes, forehead and cheek area. Can be used as an all over face treatment. Safe to use morning and night. Can be used under makeup.

Can be stored in the refrigerator. Chilling the eye treatment will activate the cucumber enzymes and aid in increasing circulation and minimizing the appearance of lines and wrinkles.

entry.title: Mangosteen Beauty Drops PM
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Owl
Type: Face Oil
Price: 85.00

An oxygenating, night time oil intended to revive dull skin - the ultimate power oil to recharge and reverse signs of fatigue. Mangosteen's natural antibacterial properties and antimicrobial compounds visibly correct skin blemishes, oily skin and chronic dry skin. Coupled with the superior powers of organic, cold-pressed South African Baobab Oil, this exquisite oil absorbs quickly, providing benefits for all skin types.

• 2 oz

Ingredients

Raw, Organic, cold-pressed African Adansonia digitata (Baobab) Oil, Pure Garcinia mangostana (Mangosteen) Oil.

Directions

Night: After washing your face, use half of one eyedropper vial. Warm oil in hands and massage onto the skin. Breathe in the sweet scent of Mangosteen as you unwind and settle into your evening. Use in conjunction with your Lavender, Geranium, or Clary Sage Beauty Drops AM.

Use as an ultra-hydrating facial mask: Squeeze one full eyedropper vial into your hands and apply onto the skin. Apply a warm washcloth onto the skin for 4 minutes. Let remaining oil penetrate. Skin is revealed glowing and oxygenated.

entry.title: Geranium Beauty Drops
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Owl
Type: Face Oil
Price: 30.00 - 50.00 (2 variants)

Geranium Beauty Drops balances, decongests and combats first signs of aging, while boosting radiance. Best for dehydrated, dull, combination skin types. This luxurious oil is to be used morning and night, in place of a serum and moisturizer.

• Soak your fingernails in one part Geranium Beauty Drops + one part lemon juice for 5-10 minutes to naturally brighten nail bed

Ingredients

Raw, Organic, Unrefined Argania Spinosa Extract, Organic Rose Geranium Oil

Directions

Night: After washing your face, use half an eyedropper vial.

entry.title: Clary Sage Beauty Drops
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Owl
Type: Face Oil
Price: 30.00 - 50.00 (2 variants)

Skin Owl's Clary Sage Beauty Drops is intended for thirsty, aging skin with a loss of radiance and elasticity. Smooths, hydrates, and plumps mature, dry skin. This luxurious oil is to be used morning and night, in place of a serum and moisturizer.

Note: Not recommended for pregnant or lactating women.

• Use on sunspots and age spots to naturally brighten your complexion

Ingredients

Raw, Organic, Unrefined Argania Spinosa Extract, Organic Clary Sage

Directions

Night: After washing your face, use half an eyedropper vial.

entry.title: Lavender Beauty Drops
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Owl
Type: Face Oil
Price: 30.00 - 50.00 (2 variants)

Lavender Beauty Drops is intended for oily, sensitive skin to combat inflammation, acne, and redness. The result is skin left looking more calm, clear and healed from within. This luxurious oil is to be used morning and night, in place of a serum and moisturizer.

• Use on sunburns, bruises, and scratches to promote faster healing

Ingredients

Raw, Organic, Unrefined Argania Spinosa Extract, Organic Lavender Oil

Directions

Morning: After washing your face, use 5-7 Drops, either alone or mixed in with your moisturizer.

Night: After washing your face, use half an eyedropper vial.
